name: Nocturnal  Spotify Theme.
description:
Nocturnal theme for Spotify, in beta currently so let me know any problems you find w/ it!

How to use: 
- Edit the theme from your User Styles addons page, and remove the comments (/* and */ ) around line 1.
- Edit the hex numbers in :root to change the colors.
